snippet: A new system would move the responsibility for testing and results management to the World Anti-Doping Agency from sports organizations, including international federations.
abstract: International Olympic Committee calls for restructured antidoping system, giving authority to World Antidoping Agency, in time for 2018 Winter Olympics.
lead_paragraph: A new system would move the responsibility for testing and results management to the World Anti-Doping Agency from sports organizations, including international federations.

headline.main: I.O.C. Wants New Global Antidoping Body by 2018
headline.print_headline: I.O.C. Calls for Transfer of Antidoping Efforts
